sentences.english: The marker vaccine is the development direction of classical swine fever vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 標記疫苗是目前豬瘟疫苗發展的趨勢。

sentences.english: The pig is the only animal in which hog cholera is known to occur naturally.
sentences.chinese: 豬是已知自然發生豬瘟的唯一動物。

sentences.english: At present, vaccine is an effective method to prevent CSFV.
sentences.chinese: 目前，接種疫苗是有效預防豬瘟病毒的方法。

sentences.english: One of the detriments is the prevalence of African Swine Fever in the Eastern regions of the country.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個損害時在該國東部區域盛行非洲豬瘟。
